Code: EXEC SQL SELECT IMP_SEGURADA_IX, PRM_TARIFARIO_IX, COD_OPCAO, PCIOCC FROM seguros.v1bilhete_cober WHERE COD_EMPRESA IN (0,9999) AND RAMOFR = :RAMOFR AND MODALIFR = :MODALIFR AND DTTERVIG BETWEEN '9000-12-31' AND '9999-12-31' AND DTINIVIG <= :DTINIVIG AND DTTERVIG >= :DTINIVIG AND IDE_COBERTURA = '1' AND COD_OPCAO = :COD_OPCAO END SQL
